content.rendered:
Smile Foundation participated for the seventh consecutive year in the Airtel Delhi Half Marathon 2016 as a “Change Runner” to raise resources for the education of children studying at Mission Education centres across India.

BlackRock, Amtek Auto Ltd.,and JK Lakshmi Cement Limited joined Smile Foundation in championing the cause, ensuring quality education for the underprivileged children.

The over 100 member strong Smile team including volunteers and employees from the supporting corporate ran for 6kms as part of the Great Delhi Run, at the Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium in New Delhi.
